level.heading: Prohibition as to itinerant locksmiths.
level.text: ยง 20-305 Prohibition as to itinerant locksmiths. It shall be unlawful for any licensed itinerant locksmith to ply his or her trade or occupation or maintain a stand within five hundred feet of any store or other permanent place of business of a licensed locksmith, or at any other place upon the streets or highways of the city where police regulations will not permit.
